11.content:
Cinderella, a young woman who's Mother died giving Birth to her 23 years prior, and the Father died a few years after that.

Now living a life of slavery with her Stepmother and two Stepsisters, forced to do all the chores, to sleep in an attic, and wear only the worst rags, while at the every beck and call of her step family.

But this need not be forever, soon, her life may change in ways that she can't even begin to imagine.

But just where, does it all begin? And how does it?
11.title: Cinderella

choices: She needs to feed the animals first
She has time still to herself
111.content:
The five chimes of the Bell at the Palace Tower, viewable from the window in her room woke Ella Tremaine up, the sun slowly rising over the horizon to dispel the dark of night. By now, the twenty-three year old was used to these very early awakenings, since she needed all the time she could get if she wanted to have every task she was given complete before the end of each day.

Hauling herself up into a sitting position, the rough covers dropped to reveal a slightly too-thin frame, but one that still supported a pair of hefty breasts (easily in the FF-range), shoulder-length strawberry-blond hair on an oval face with petite nose and well-formed lips.

Her bedroom since the age of fourteen had been this one, a small attic room set in the single tower of the chateau that was the Tremaine household. Sparsely furnished with a small wardrobe, two desks, a chest and her bed, whose covers and pillows she’d made herself out of whatever she’d been able to scavenge and repurpose from the throwaways of her stepsisters.

Sitting up properly now disturbed the sleep of the other inhabitants of the room, three small lizards she kept with her for companionship, by the names of Donald, Mickey, and Daisy.

“Did I wake you?” She asked them, knowing they couldn’t voice an answer to her, though the way they turned to look at her and softly hissed told her that they understood what she said. “I’m so sorry, but you know what they‘re like.” Referring to her ‘family’.

“But I do think we have time enough for a little story.” She addressed the others now in site as she slipped on her simple maid’s outfit. Four small mice and a pair of bluebirds. “Which one should it be though?”

The squeaks from the mice were almost unintelligible, but she got the jist of what they were saying, having spoken to them before. “That one then?” A series of nods confirmed her suspicions as she took a seat. “Very well then.”

As they took their places, she began her story:

“It was ten years ago, the day my father died. And the day that my Stepmother made her true colours known. Cold. Bitter. Visibly jealous of me. And grimly determined to advance her own daughters at all cost. Something she hid from my father very well, he never noticed, not even once.” She paused to let them take it in, even though she had told them this story before. “All the servants in the house were fired, their tasks falling to me. My old bedroom they now use as their Music Room as I was sent here within a year of his Death. I’ve had no good clothes in years, just whatever I can make out of whatever‘s thrown away. Then five years ago, after cleaning out the fireplaces, they came up with the name of Cinderella to call me by.” Ella Tremaine finished off.

They did look dejected as she recited this part of the tale. “Oh, no need to look down, if nothing else it did allow me to meet you all, and for that reason I keep on going.” She rose up and made for the door. “Now I really must start with the chores, otherwise it will be after nightfall before I am finished.”
111.title: The start of another day

choices: She works out a means of attending the Ball

1111.content:
Having had to walk into town, it was almost six by the time she arrived, and the market had just started to open. With so few in the square at this time, it was easy for her to purchase all she had been required to in short time, the work completed in less than thirty minutes. But as she was ready to return to the chateau, a Town Crier made an announcement.

“There is to be! In honour of the Prince Henry Joseph Charmont! A Royal Ball! To be held two nights from now! And by Royal Command! Every Eligible Maiden is required to attend!” As he repeated his statement, Ella, amongst others came closer where a few others, most likely employees of the castle began to hand out notices to them, basically a copy of what was being said by the Crier along with invites.

With this, maybe, just maybe, she could have a means to escape the life of servitude she had endured for years. Ideas for how she could achieve this already forming in her mind.
1111.title: An Announcement is Made

112.content:
So it's the Night of the Grand Ball arranged by the reigning Monarch. Officially a celebration of his Son's, the Prince Charmont return following a lengthy diplomatic mission. Unofficially, it's to get every eligible maiden in the Kingdom in the hopes that he will find the one for him.

But as for Cinderella. Have arrangements been made to make possible her entry to the Palace? Have such plans been scuppered? Does she even intend to go at all?
112.title: The Night of the Ball

113.content:
Inside a Carriage pulled by six horses, guided by a Coachman, with a Footman holding on at the back, sat a young lady. Twenty-three years of age, with hair that drifted between golden-blond and soft brown, dressed in a luxurious blue silk dress with crystal tiara and glass slippers. Her name, Cinderella. Returning home after a truly wonderful night at the ball at the King's Palace, but home was where she needed to return to. And with good reason.

Her Dream to be able to get away from her torturous existence - where she had been reduced to a Servant inside of her own home, since her Father had tragically perished 16 years before, forced to live in the cold attic, with only the barest of rags to wear, always at the beck and call of her Stepmother and her Stepsisters - had been exactly that. A dream.

And she was under no illusion. The Carriage was a Pumpkin. The horses, mice that she'd secured from a trap. The Footman, a lizard that she had managed to secretly keep as a pet. The Coachman, Major, the Horse kept in the Stables. Her dress, made out of possibly nothing since they had torn her dress off of her, piece by piece, leaving her with nothing to wear. All made possible by a Fairy Godmother who had taken pity on her, and allowed her a chance to spend the night at the Ball. And only the night.

While the night ended and dawn broke, the spell would fade, like the dream. As such, she had been forced to slip out without anyone noticing her absence, the lack of anyone chasing them suggesting that either she had succeeded or they weren't bothering, yet.

Looking out the window, she could see that the sky wasn't quite as dark as before, and the interior didn't feel quite as fine and soft as it had been. Turning to see the Footman - the lizard she'd named Donald - she could see him giving her a toothy smile and nod of appreciation, with a face that had started to crack and sharper teeth. The Magic was fading.

And now she faced a choice. They could leave the road and try to go through the forest on a more Direct Route to get back sooner, and avoid being seen as everything return to as it had been before. Or the carriage could be abandoned and they'd head back on foot through the forest. But since this part of the road would be clear, with no other houses in view, it could well be safer sticking to it and going faster. In any case though, she didn't believe that she should stay inside the carriage in the event it reverted to a pumpkin early.

That's why she'd already slipped out of the carriage, letting Donald see her do so, to be at the front. Sliding carefully onto Major's lap, who gave her a wider smile with a face that had pushed out ever so slightly as he shifted himself a little bit to make her more comfortable. Her legs over to the left side, she looked forwards and up to see a sky that was less black as she made her decision on the course of action to take.
113.title: Got to get back before Sunrise

1132.content:
"Major, perhaps we should take the next turn-off, and go through the forest. That way, we should be able to reach the house sooner." Cinderella suggested, eyes aimed ahead, towards the upcoming turn.

Nodding in approval, Major flicked the reins to speed them up a bit, one of the horses having sprouted mouse’s ears, another sign that time was against them. The resultant left turn towards the wood’s natural path allowed Cinderella one last look at the city before the treetops blocked out not only that, but the moonlight, the lightening sky as well, the small lamp on the left of the carriage their sole light source.

“It, was…nicce” Perhaps the darkness, combined with the great many hours she had been awake for, was the reason for the slowed, slightly sluured speech as Cinderella leaned into her transforming coachman. “A nice…nnight.”

Something Major was about to agree with when his longer, fur coated face began to turn beetroot. Looking at her, he could see her dress shrinking down her breasts, first one, then the other nipple peeking out, hardening against the cool breeze. Already, he could feel his penis becoming uncomfortably erect in his tightening trousers at the sight, something he hoped his beautiful mistress didn’t notice.

Though as he slowly shifted himself - to open his legs a bit - he did notice something else a quick look confirming that his shoes and socks had fallen off. That his feet were once more hard black hooves however, was what had startled Major. The magic was clearly fading away, not only that, it seemed to be speeding up when he risked a look behind to see that the golden carriage was now green and orange, the bald scaled head of the reptilian footman peeking over the top.

As much as he wanted to warn his mistress about this, one look confirmed to him that she had since fallen asleep in his arms, dress still shrinking down her slim frame. So rather than awaken her, Major decided he could let her get her much-needed sleep while they could still use the carriage to continue the journey home.

The next twenty minutes or so proved to be rather…uncomfortable…to say the least as far as Major was concerned, his growing frame digging painfully into his clothes. Furthermore, since before they had even first arrived at the Palace he had been holding something in, his own need to relieve himself, and now his bladder, and his bowels had become rather painfully full. And as much as he wanted to just let it all out, he knew he couldn’t do that while they were moving, especially while his mistress was sitting on his lap.

Finally some relief came, a tear coming from his back, and the feeling of his breathing becoming easier. His shirt had been ripped open by his widening form, the scraps of material sliding down, revealing his thick, chiselled, dappled grey fur-coated chest.

Shortly after this, his legs were freed when his trousers were torn down the seam, flopping away to show off his trunk-like legs, his re-grown tail that could now swish freely beneath his tailcoat, and his swollen horse cock that brushed against Cinderella’s legs each time the carriage bounced. That she was still asleep at this time was the only reason the now completely horse-faced Major could discern for her not noticing his meaty shaft slapping her, even if he had more serious concerns right now.

With the carriage more pumpkin than carriage, it had become dangerously unstable, each dip and bump making the organic contraption swing around, forcing him to fight to keep any measure of control, only the fact that one of the horses pulling it had since reverted to a mouse again, scurrying away (correction, two now) meant it was now slow enough to hold it together.

Another risked look behind confirmed to Major that Mr Lizard was in little better shape. Now a man-sized Lizardman, thick tail swinging behind him to help balance him atop the gyrating pumpkin, his own green-and-gold-patterned tailcoat the only thing he was wearing now, his scaled cock and balls hard and pointed up.

His mistress herself had since lost her own beautiful dress, glass slippers now just humble slip-on work shoes. Still blissfully unaware of the growing danger as she continued to sleep.

It had become very difficult for Major to hold it all in on the other hand, as his grey-blue tailcoat tore apart, his back and thick arms exposed to the elements now. The constant bouncing and swinging of the carriage, his massive shaft slapping against his and his mistress’s legs (sending pulsating tingling pleasure through it) combined with his ever growing need to release his bodily waste all came together to attempt to cripple his inhibitions, sheer force of will all that held it in.

Now clad solely in his tight white drivers gloves and three-point hat, Major sank down as the seat began to collapse thanks to both his greater weight and its own reversion. It was just as he tried to steady himself, to shift his mistress who now was pressed into him that…

115.content:
Steampunk. A genre that operates on the Core Principle that Steam Power is the dominant mode of the economy and society, usually using the American Wild West or British Victorian Era as its benchmarks. So to work this story into this setting, means a lot of steam powered apparatus both in the home and around the kingdom. Additionally, Monarchical Governance will certainly be the main form for Government in effect for this setting.

Expect to see Lighter-Than-Air Travel for the Elite via Semi-Rigid and Rigid Airships, with ground-based steam powered transportations alongside it, thought the horse-driven carriage would still be a common form for the not-as-but-still-reasonably well off.

With this information, all that’s required is to selected a point to begin the story, and build this new world from it.

11533.content:
For this alternate setting for the Cinderella story, there is more than one sentient species residing in this world of Magic, of Fantasy. A mix of lizard and human, they are known officially as Gekkota D and P (a reference to the two groups whose main difference is how they stand, D for Digitigrade and P for Planitgrade) and more derogatively as Lizards.

Normally 150-165 cm, the Gekkota D legs have very short shins with elongated feet that stand behind the main body, counterbalanced by the long flexible tails they have. Long jaws, sharp teeth, and clawed hands and feet of a predatory species, though they are generally a caring group with a strong concept of family. Usually a dark to medium green for their scales, with a paler green-white underbelly, and slitted eyes that can have their irises rounded for improved night visibility. Intellect is generally lower than an equivalent human, their IQ ranging from 70-80% that of a human’s in most cases, though this is enough for them to learn what they need to get by. They are also more vulnerable to temperature extremes, and need to use their environment to aid in temperature regulation.

Gekkota P are physically built a little more like humans in the superficial sense, in that the leg design is identical, save for the slightly wider waist to allow for their tails (which are generally slightly shorter and thinner than their Type-D counterparts), and ranging from 160-180 cm in height. Their scale colour usually ranges from blue-green to teal-green for the main body, with amber-yellow to green-yellow on their undersides.

In both cases, they are not an egg-laying species, giving birth to live young with said young having a dependency on their parents for the first few years of their lives.

Usually habituating the more Southern regions of this world, many travelled further North for work, or rather, they were travelled North to have their, ‘services’, put to use by the populace.

Often seen working the low-end jobs that others don’t want, or as low-level servants within households, and for little more than some food and a roof. It is not unusual to see even a lower-income household have at least one Gekkota residing to perform the menial tasks that leaves both parents free to work for money.

Wealthier households will oft-have several Gekkota in their service, with only the Topmost Elite employing paid human servants, a means of displaying their wealth and power by being able to afford such help.

For a time, this enabled a burst of growth in the wealth and prosperity of the Northern Kingdoms, for a time, it was good.

But the good times were not to last.

The Economies built on slavery of a race faltered as the influx of cheap labour stifled growth, and discontent set in. Wealth went into decline, and the enslaved race began to push for recognition.

It came slowly, tentatively, but bit by bit, they began to attain a few rights. Little more than to make what they already had a requirement, and enough loopholes to keep the pay down to an absolute minimum, but it came nonetheless. Enough to quell the unrest and allow a small recovery to begin.

And then came the invention of Steam.

With it, carriages could carry far more than before, delivering goods and people across greater distances. Ships that once needed sails and the wind could now power their own way across the seas and oceans. On special rails, carriages could takes hundreds of tons, hundreds of people from one end to the other. Roads smooth enough for use complementing this, some of sufficient money or rank able to own personal transport.

And still - with a handful of exceptions - the Gekkota were Second-Class Citizens in the Human-Ruled Lands.

But how does Cinderella fit into this story now? She could be human, living in this world with her own beliefs and sense of right-and-wrong.

But she might be Gekkota? Which opens up a whole can of possibilities to be explored.

1153322.content:
Ella Tremaine never knew her birth parents, the ones who had brought her into this world, and left her afterwards. When she asked, her adoptive father, Albert Tremaine would only answer that he and his wife found her mother dying with her in her arms, begging them to see her safe with the last minute of life she had left in her.

Though illness from which she never fully recovered from, Catherine Tremaine could no longer bare any children of her own. Childless, they decided to take her in as their own, naming her Eleanor (Ella for short) after his Aunt.

The Tremaine Household had been merchants for generations, but Albert had seen the opportunity afforded by the High-Pressure Steam Engine, its applicability for the transportation of goods and people, creating a number of Road-Going Steam Locomotives powered by a compact engine of his own design.

Two such designs had proven to be particularly successful.

The Tremaine Steam Carriage. A three-wheel carriage suitable for four passengers, one driver, and one boiler man. Tall yet stable, its four horsepower engine and condenser making it well-suited for the well-off to travel.

The other was known as the Tremaine Steam Coach. Significantly larger and with a twenty-six horsepower engine plus condenser to haul not only the four-wheeled coach along, but up to three tons towed behind it. This permitting its use for goods haulage where rail was impractical, or many passengers in a separate coach behind it. And thanks to its own passenger compartment, ahead of the boiler and behind the driver, could and did see use as personal transport for the wealthy.

Two of each Albert had to his own name, residing within his chateau a good couple of miles (twenty-five) from the nearby city where the country’s monarch ruled. The outskirts of which held the factory where his Carriages and Coaches were constructed under his watchful eye.

It was in the chateau that Ella spent her early years, tutors hired to teach her as best as they were able, her own willingness to learn perhaps the greatest aid they had.

But tragedy was to strike. Aged seven, Ella witnessed the first sign of cruelty in the World, when her adoptive mother’s illness eventually took its toll on her. Before her death, she was able to speak with Ella:

“Listen closely, dear Ella. The World outside might well become a harsh, and cruel place for you to live, but I know you will rise above it all. For you have shown to everyone, the kindness, the compassion you have within yourself. You have, more kindness in just one finger, than many will have in their whole bodies.” Catherine was able to speak, barely above a whisper. “Have Courage little Ella, and be Kind. For where there is Kindness, there is Goodness. And where there is Goodness, there is Magic.”

Ella took this lesson to Heart, always remembering her adoptive mother’s last words to her. Sometimes outside to help with feeding the animals they kept, and never one with a bad word to say.

Albert though, was rather more affected by her passing, using his work as a means to distract himself from his grief for a while. So even as he improved his designs and made better coaches and carriages, the time he spent with Ella became less. Something that did not go unnoticed, and he was made to confront. Slowly, he began to restore his work/life balance, and though he continued to care deeply for his adopted daughter, did come to feel that she still needed a mother.

So it was that shortly after she turned nine, that Albert finally remarried, choosing for his second wife, one who was recently widowed herself, with two daughters of her own of eleven and thirteen years. She too, had known grief. But she carried her grief in a manner unlike that of Ella and Albert.

Tragedy, however, was fated to strike Ella again, and this time the effects would strike her directly.
1153322.title: Raised by humans, loving humans

11533221.content:
It was a night Eleanor Tremaine would remember, for every remaining day that she lived. It had begun months back, the odd cough and wheeze from Albert, initially dismissed as just a bout of illness that would pass, it instead grew worse. His appetite became less, his weight fell until he became very gaunt, and his energy seemed to be sapped away from him.

One day, Ella enter her adoptive father’s bedroom to wake him.

He never did.

A week later following his funeral, things began to change in the Chateau. Ella found herself being given tasks to perform for the step-family that the late Albert had brought into the household. They were small, at first, delivering tea and snacks, feeding the animals, some dusting work.

It changed as the years passed. At thirteen, she noticed that the staffing levels had become less, her own workload increasing to plug the gap. Also not escaping her attention was the fact that the tutors who had been there to teach her were no longer around, the chateau feeling emptier without so many people around.

When she asked this of her step-mother, her answer had been that without a solid income, she had been forced to economise, to make the money they did have last long enough to allow a future. Of course, what she meant was that she was trying to make it hold out until she could marry off at one of her own daughters into wealth to secure their futures, and thus her own.

At the age of sixteen, when she entered adulthood, Ella had spent the past year living in the attic room, Anastasia having been moved into her old room on the grounds that they were grown women and now needed their own space.

It had also been during these few years that Ella had noticed something occurring with her body. As her species birthed live young, and reared them, breasts were something they developed, usually a relatively small pair as so not to hinder their mobility, but by seventeen she was already sporting a very large pair, pushing out almost the depth of her chest with an areola matching her main scales. Very easy to spot too as for the past few years she had been forced to cut and re-sew her old clothes to provide her with some form of decency.

Before she lost her father, she had a range of dresses to wear, and good footwear. Neither had been replaced over the years by Lady Tremaine (as she insisted on Ella addressing her as) forcing her first to go barefoot as she outgrew her shoes, and then try to provide cover for her enlarging breasts as they became more and more pronounced.

By nineteen they had fallen into too poor a state of disrepair to serve their role anymore, and she now worked in the Tremaine Household, a naked Gekkota ‘Lizard’ Servant. Only given sufficient food to make sure she could do her work and nothing else. It was at the age of nineteen that she realised what they had reduced her to, barred from even leaving the Chateau grounds, at the beck-and-call of her increasingly vain and selfish step-sisters who continued to have luxuries squandered on them.

The only ones she could relate to were four small mice who had retreated to the Attic to keep from the cat Lady Tremaine had brought with her, and replaced, and two small mundane lizards that had managed to work their way into the small room. Their names, Jacqueline, Octavius, Matilda, Teddy for the mice. Donald and Mickey were the names she gave to the lizards. With them, she found solace, those she could talk to and let out her frustrations, lightening the load on her soul enough that she could make it through the long hard days.

Now at the age of twenty, having endured nine years of this increasingly degrading treatment Ella found herself inside the fireplace of the dining room, the long brush reaching up to pull away at the soot and cinders that had built up there over time, much of it landing either next to or on her bare body.

Through witnessing this, Anastasia and Drizella began experimenting with names to call her by. From Lizard-Wench, they moved to Dirty-Ella, Lizard-Dirt, before they arrived at ‘Cinderella’. With the approval of their mother, the name they had settled on became the name they used to brand her. Cinderella.

124.content:
Leaning back in the rocking chair, the Wolf had his eyes shut and a smile on his muzzle.

‘Securing this cottage was so easy.’ He thought as he sighed contentedly as he kept up the relaxing rocking motion, his tail swung around his right leg.

Looking at him, it was actually quite laughable, his attempt at passing himself off as an old lady. Not only was he coated in light-grey fur, he was also possessing quite and athletic build, good thick muscles that spoke of endurance and next to no body fat. While his feet were clearly longer than a human’s, and he moved around on the balls of his feet and not the ankles, they also weren’t long enough to be digitigrades, sitting half-way between the two stances. Short black claws ended his fingers and toes, and were sharp as well.

And all he had to hide this was a silk dressing gown (soft black with red outlines) that he had tied shut around his torso, a pair of reading glasses that lacked the ear supports, instead using a large nose grip to support them, a cap to cover his pointed ears with, and a pair of slippers that he couldn’t fit his longer feet into properly.

‘No matter. It only has to last long enough to get the job done.’ He consoled himself, his back to the window so that the chair itself could hide him had the curtains been open.

One more thing he needed to keep out of site was his lupine cock, currently shielded by the silk dressing gown, but could be spotted if he wasn’t careful.

Not too long later, and he heard a rapping at the door, it could only be one person, the 22-year old Riding Hood that he’d met once or twice before.

“Come on in Dear, the door is open.” He called out in the most feminine voice that he could manage. ‘Just a few moments more now.’ He added to himself with a quiet chuckle.

A flock of blue jays nesting in the nearby trees fled from their homes as Rapunzel burped in glee. Viewing it from a distance, she could see that it had a cylinder shape. The foundation was a firm red brick circle resting on hard dirt. Her room was 30 feet up, judging from the placement of the window. There didn’t seem to be any other means of getting inside. No door or other window of any kind. No wonder it was so difficult to ascend to the top. The diameter was estimated to have reached 15 feet across. Its scarlet-tiled roof capped off the top like a hat, bringing the total height of the tower up to 45 feet.

“This is amazing!” She screamed, cocooning herself in her elongated hair as she rolled on the ground.

“Aww. It’s so cute!” Rapunzel gushed, spotting a duck swimming in a pond just at the edge of the clearing where the tower resided.

Rapunzel scooped it up her hands, water dripping between her fingers, and brought the bird to her face. Watching it flap its wings, sprinkling drops of water on her face, the young woman’s green irises lit up ever more. She petted it on its head with her right index finger, dislodging some ivory feathers that were scattered by the summer breeze.

“Hazel, look what I found!” She turned to her new friend, showing off the duckling. “I wonder what it is.”

“Maybe you got it from your mother too.” Rapunzel theorized.

The brunette let out a quiet giggle.

“That might be.” She grinned. “How are you so content with belching?”

Rapunzel thought about it a bit.

“Probably because there’s no one around for me to humiliate myself in front of.” The maiden responded. “It’d likely be different if I spent more time outside.”

This got Hazel thinking.

“Why don’t you go outside?” The new girl mused.

Rapunzel’s eyes widened in shock.

“I’m afraid.” She stated, her corneas beginning to moisten. “My mother put me in her to protect me, saying that the world was full of scary monsters, awful people, and dangerous places!”

Hazel gasped.

“That’s awful.” Hazel commented. “I know that the outside is great, and you can too if you want.”

Rapunzel weighed her options. If she left with this woman who she just met, then who knows how her mother might react? However, if she stayed, she might never know what the outside world was like firsthand. Taking a breath to calm her nerves, she replied.

“I’ll go. We can use my hair as a rope.”

Hazel gave Rapunzel a strange look. Yeah, her shining locks were said to possess supposedly mystical properties, but being able to descend a 40-foot tower using them?

“Forgive my doubts, but that sounds preposterous.” Hazel objected.

“It does, but if used my hair to help my mother climb the tower before.” Rapunzel explained. “There’s a hook on the right side of the window where I can it so I don’t get hurt.”

Hazel turned to the window to see that a large hook in the wall was indeed nearby.

“Oh.”

~

Rapunzel wrapped her hair to the hook before throwing the rest outside, creating a soft landing spot for them. Then, Hazel gripped it like a pole and slid down. She was going a bit too fast for her liking though, so in a fit of fear she broke wind with enough force to let her float slowly to the ground. Rapunzel saw this and giggled immaturely. But, then she got an idea. Untying her hair, she leaped out of her home and dived into the grass. Hazel clasped her hands over her mouth in suspense, but then Rapunzel smirked and summoned another powerful eructation.

~*BBBBBBUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!*~

Fueled by an intense self-preservation instinct, this belch’s power was increased to decrease the speed of her descent and like Hazel, she landed with a grace that was belied by her gassy emission. Without thinking, Hazel brought Punzie into a passionate embrace.

… Then she realized what did.

“Oh. I-I’m so sorry.” She sputtered, quickly breaking up the hug. “I was just… just scared for you.”

Rapuzel paused for a bit, then started laughing.

“It’s fine.” The blond assured, her green eyes glowing. “Even I wasn’t sure if that would work. All that matters is that I’m safe.”

Hazel let out a sigh of relief. What an awkward moment.

“So, what do people do outside?” Rapunzel questioned.

Hazel responded…

151331221.content:
(A/N: I am sorry for not posting for a while. I promise to you that I WILL contribute more to yours and others stories that I've been a part of in the future.)

Amy sat on the wooden floor, still trying to process what had just happened.

“It really is you.” She admitted, a dumb smile etching her lower face. “I never would’ve guessed.”

“Don’t blame yourself.” Rapunzel said, extending a hand. “My looks don’t really indicate what I can go.”

The redhead grabbed the outstretched appendage and was pulled up to her feet. After dusting herself off, she shook the blond maiden’s hand.

“That was a nice burp.” The new woman complimented. “Better than any other I’ve heard.”

“Thank you.” Rapunzel blushed. “It’s not often I find someone who respects my talent.”

“Well, anyone who can’t see something good in what you can do is an idiot.” Amy added, then changed the subject to talk about the elephant in the room. “So, why are up in this tower anyway? It seems pretty inconvenient.”

Rapunel took a moment to think about her response. It would definitely sound unusual to someone unfamiliar with her situation.

“My mother, Dame Gothel, sent me here when I was 12.” She answered. “She said that it was to protect me from the dangers of the outside.”

Amy’s jaw dropped in disbelief.

“Nonsense.” The ginger scoffed. “The world isn’t perfect, but it’s still a great place. Let me show you.”

Punzie pondered her possible choices. Her hands shook in fear of the unknown world. She debated if she should accept the word of a woman she just met over the woman who’d raised her all her life. There was a great feeling of doubt, but also of excitement. This woman appeared to have had an adventure or two and she was fine as far as Rapunzel could tell. This ‘Amy’ also had more experience in the outside world than her, by virtue of not having been stuck in a 40 foot tower for years. Eventually, she made her decision.

“Fine.” The Maiden in the Tower agreed. “I’ll go with you.”

“You don’t have to do it just because I suggested it.” Amy advised, putting her arms out in front of her. “If you leave, it should be of your own volition. So, do you really want to?”

Rapunzel took a deep breath and responded the way that only she could.”

“~*YYYEEEESSSSSSSSSSS!*~”

Once again, the scarlet-haired tomboy found herself swept off of her feet by one of the host’s beastly belches. Thankfully, She caught herself just in time by grabbing onto a hook near the window. Realizing her error, Rapunzel actually blushed in response to her usually proud burps and went to check on her guest.

“Oh my.” She exclaimed. “Are you alright?”

Slightly dazed, Amy staggered to walk on her own again.

“Yes.” She replied. “But next time, try not to blast me out your window.”

The both of them shared a quick laugh at Amy’s somewhat dark joke. Then, Rapunzel tied her lengthy locks around the hook and threw the rest down to the wet grass below. Amy gripped the superhumanly strong follicles and fearlessly descended, taking long hops on the tower like future rock climbers will on mountains. After two minutes, she reached the ground safely. Seeing her new friend uninjured, Rapunzel breathed a sigh of relief.

“Are you ready to get down?” Amy shouted.

“Yes!” The blonde replied just as loudly.

Loosening the hair a bit on the hook, Rapunzel slowly walked onto the windowsill and gazed at the ground. Looking at it from so high up made her disoriented and slightly nauseous. Then, she took a moment to recompose herself before diving off of the edge. Amy wrapped her hands around her end of the makeshift rope, gradually letting it go to lower Rapunzel to the tower’s base. In about four minutes, Rapunzel’s yellow-clad feet met the soft grass.

“I’m outside. It’s really happening.” She muttered.

Punzie paused to take in the outdoors. She removed her shoes and wiggled her toes in the dew covered grass. It was an odd but not unpleasant feeling. Next, a cool summer breeze bushed up on her from behind, making her giggle. The 17 year old shielded her corneas as the Sun’s rays shone on her from its position in the blue noon sky. From a nearby apple tree, tiny birds were heard singing a melodious tune.

“How does it feel?” Amy inquired.

With a calm grin, Rapunzel took a deep breath.

“~*GGGRRRRRRREEEEEEAAAAAAAAAAATTTTTTT!*~”

151331222.content:
(A/N: I am sorry for not posting for a while. I promise to you that I WILL contribute more to yours and others stories that I've been a part of in the future.)

Amy sat on the wooden floor, still trying to process what had just happened.

“It really is you.” She admitted, a dumb smile etching her lower face. “I never would’ve guessed.”

“Don’t blame yourself.” Rapunzel said, extending a hand. “My name is Rapunzel and my looks can be deceiving.”

The redhead grabbed the outstretched appendage with her bruised hands and was pulled up to her feet. After dusting herself off, she shook the blond maiden’s hand.

“That was a nice burp.” The new woman complimented. “Better than any other I’ve heard.”

“Thank you.” Rapunzel blushed. “It’s not often I find someone who respects my talent.”

“Well, anyone who can’t see something good in what you can do is an idiot.” Amy added, then blushed as well. “In fact, it’s kind of… attractive in a way.”

Now the golden-haired girl’s blush intensified. To her, belching was a lot of things; namely loud, smelly, unmannerly, and entertaining. But to say that it was attractive? That was something that she never expected to be an adequate adjective for it. As she looked at the ivory-clad woman who gave the odd compliment, both of their face grew redder.

“I’m sorry.” Amy finally broke the awkward silence. “I might’ve given you too much praise.”

Rapunzel’s mouth morphed from an embarrassed frown into a warm smile.

“Again, you shouldn’t be.” The golden-hearted girl repeated. “Though, I suppose saying my burps are attractive is a strange statement.”

“Right, I’d better explain.” Amy said, her blush starting to fade. “First off, I should say that I have certain ‘feelings’ towards other women.”

Rapunzel’s cheeks were once more tinted crimson at the proclamation.

“There’s also another reason that I traveled here.” Amy continued, a cold sweat forming on her thin arms. “When I heard rumors of your incredible belching abilities, I genuinely hoped that it was true. Ever since I could remember, people have ostracized me for my masculine behavior and my… er, preferences toward others of my gender.”

“You can stop trying to imply that you’re homosexual. “Rapunzel suggested bluntly. “I can tell that’s what you mean.”

Amy paused for a bit, momentarily stunned by Punzie’s surprising showing of bluntness. Then, gulping nervously, she resumed her abridged autobiography.

“Right… Well, the other reason I came here was because I have a certain… reaction to females belching.” Her blush returned, exceeding the shade of red that her locks had. “Whenever, I hear a girl let out a fierce eructation, my… southern extremities get excited.”

Though she spent a good chunk of her life essentially trapped inside of a tower, even a sheltered maiden like Rapunzel expected what the tomboy was getting at.

What she didn’t expect though was said tomboy cranking her head forward and planting a thin-lipped smooch on her lips. The blonde’s eyes widened further than she thought possible, a swarm of conflicting emotions blotting the clarity in her mind. Part of her wanted to shove the girl off for her actions. Who would do something like this after telling a story like that?! Another felt too much sympathy for her to do that. Amy had said she was often the source of ridicule just for being who she was, so maybe this was just an emotional impulse on her part. A third consideration was that this wasn’t all that bad. It was a rather unorthodox way of continuing a story, but not in and of itself detestable. While Punzie was facing mental conflict, Amy was enjoying herself more than ever before! Getting to express all of the sexual desire that society forced her to bottle up for so long was without a doubt exhilarating. But in a way, she also felt a bit guilty. After spouting out her life story to this girl, she decided to take advantage of her unfocused state just to vent off some simmering lust. It was a sensation that each found to be both pleasurable and painful in a certain way. Rapunzel in particular found it to be rather exciting, having not figured that she’d play that proverbial side. One could say that she found it just a tad too exciting, given what was to follow:

“~*BBBBBBEEEEEEELLLLLLCCCCCCCHHHHHHHH!*~”

Both of their eyes shot open as Rapunzel launched her regurgitated oxygen down Amy throat, expelling so much that the redhead’s cheeks had to puff out just to create ample space. Though muffled, the belch still carried enough power to echo in the room. Amy’s taste buds were bombarded with tastes of garlic, onions, cheese, and pork, all wrapped in a coating of stomach acid, as the eructation reached its end. Afterwards, Rapunzel ceased the locking of lips, leaving a single strand of saliva to connect them. Hot tears cascaded down her face as she clasped her hands over her mouth. For the first time in her life, she was ashamed of her burping.

Then, she noticed something. Looking down at the grime-encrusted pants of her guest, she could see a large dark stain in the middle of the crotch area. The owner of those pants was still out of it, trapped in a perverted bliss that she’d be unlikely to experience again. Quickly though, she was snapped back to reality by a soft push to the stomach by the tower’s host.

“Huh, wuh… Ugh.” The redhead mumbled. “What happened?”

“You were telling me about your past before kissing me on the lips.” Punzie recapped with tear-swollen eyes. “Then, I belched long and hard into your mouth and when it ended, I saw you have a big stain on your pants.”

Confused, Amy took a quick glance down at her clothes and gasped at the moist area that had drowned her undergarments.

“Oh my!” She exclaimed. “Rapunzel, I am so sorry!”

The blond began to get misty-eyed again before getting a hold of herself.

“No, I should apologize for getting so caught up in it. This probably wouldn’t have gotten like this if I had stopped sooner.”

Both of the spent the next couple of minutes exchanging apologies and taking the blame for what happened. Eventually, the absurdity of their situation got them to start laughing. And with the laughter came tears from each girl. It was Rapunzel’s tears that were especially important, because as they dripped from her nose, a few drops rained on Amy’s calloused hands. The somewhat painful reminders of her long escalation to the room vanished instantaneously. The giggle fit was cut short as they took a gander at the weird phenomenon that had transpired.

“You can heal with your tears?” Amy asked.

“I-I didn’t know that I could.” Rapunzel replied. “This has certainly been one eventful start to my day.”

15423.content:
As Jack begins to trek his way down the huge exterior of the massive stoned palace, he begins to notice just how deteriorated the outer walls were. Cracks aligned most of the massive bricks as large trails of vines and other greenery were creeping their way up the sturdy surface. Just by the sight alone, it was obvious to tell that the whole place must've been abandoned for quite some time. It was actually quite a oddity, especially considering all the wondrous sights beheld around such a kingdom.

"That's strange..." Jack mutters as he soon stood before the massive drawbridge of the castle. Whether it was luck or some different unforeseen force, the massive wooden frame of the bridge was descended firmly upon the grassy ground, giving Jack a clear way into the castle. Undaunted by the sight, Jack quickly scampers his way onto the wooden surface and straight pas the bard gates of the castles entrance. "Huh...this actually should be easy." Jack chortled to himself. With an abandoned castle this size, there was no telling what kind of leftover wealth reside within the vast interiors of such a royal residence. Little did Jack know of the true inhabitant of the vast establishment.

Deep within the dark corridors of the castle in a rather regal room, a black wet nose wiggled up and down as an odd scent managed to creep it's way up it's nostrils. "Wha?" the voice of a young woman stammers in a surprised if not shocked tone by the sudden discovery. For years she has been in solitude in this prison she used to call home. But now, in the most unexpected of moments, a visitor has come to her very home. "I...Is someone finally here?" she mumbles to herself unsure if her sense of smell was beginning to play tricks on her after several moments of false hope. After giving one more deep inhale, a sudden gasp and flutter of her heart resounded from her form. "a visitor..." she stammers in a quivering, overjoyed voice.

"Jeez...I didn't expect this place to be so huge." Jack mutters as he soon finds hi way within the main corridor of the gigantic castle. All about his surroundings, regal furniture stood against the walls rivaling that of the homes back in his very home town. As Jacks eyes scan about the area, it seemed as if every single thing that looked of worth was either way too big to carry, or on the floor scattered into hundreds of pieces. "Just what could've caused all this..." Jack mutters as his curiosity over the odd sights begin to dwell even more in his mind. As he returns his gaze straight back to his walking path, an odd sight soon came to view. With all the candles and lanterns blown out, the whole castle had to rely solely upon cracked windows and broken walls in order to sustain light within. Despite this worn down way in retrieving lights, deep within the shadowy recesses of the hallway were what appeared to be two large golden orbs high above the ground.

"Wha?" Jack mumbles with a scowl on his face over the strange view. 'Just what could those strange balls of gold be?' he thought to himself. As his eyes soon narrowed to a squint in hopes of catching a more better glimpse of the odd objects, to his shock and disbelief, the yellow orbs quickly vanished and reappeared once more almost as if they were blinking. It didn't take long to notice that those two circles actually belonged to some sort of creature within the castle. With heart pounding and a nervous sweat dripping down his brow, Jack was on the verge of making a run directly towards the castle entryway straight back down the beanstalk. The creature, obviously took notice of the prepared movements as thunderous BOOMS and tremors sounded off directly from the darkness. To Jacks horror, the creature was making it's way directly towards him.

info.brief_description: Exactly what it says on the tin.  Any Fairy Tale.  Any way.  No Restrictions.
info.description:
This Interactive is for you to create your own variants/spins on classic Fairy Tales. There are no limits. There are no restrictions. I do, however, ask that each new chapter added adds to the story's progression - or if making a new one, is done properly, while I also expect proper grammar throughout. Poorly made chapters will be deleted without warning.

When making a new spin on the Fairy Tale, it need only be familiar at the start. From there on out, everything is fair game.

And now, pick a story and make it your own.
